## ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - 1.E.4 â€” The Vote That Never Closed

The first interplanetary vote to span Earth, Luna, Mars, and the Belt was never concluded. Not because it failedâ€”but because closure itself became impossible across distance. This Chronicle records the moment humanity learned that consensus does not end; it decays.

tags: ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - 1.E.4 â€” The Vote That Never Closed

The first interplanetary vote to span Earth, Luna, Mars, and the Belt was never concluded. Not because it failedâ€”but because closure itself became impossible across distance. This Chronicle records the moment humanity learned that consensus does not end; it decays.
